name: False Opening
text: When you make a ranged attack while threatened, you can fool your opponent into thinking he has an opening.
prerequisites: Dex 13, Dodge, Close Quarters Thrower or Point-Blank Master, Weapon Focus with selected ranged weapon.
benefit: Choose a ranged weapon or a thrown weapon. When you make a ranged attack using that weapon, you can choose to provoke an attack of opportunity from one or more opponents who threaten you. You gain a +4 dodge bonus against such attacks. An opponent that makes such an attack and misses you loses his Dexterity bonus to AC against you until the end of your turn.
staminaText: When you use this feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to make an attack of opportunity against an opponent who misses you with the provoked attack (after it loses its Dexterity bonus to AC against you).
text_zh: 当你在敌人威胁范围内进行远程攻击，你可以诱使他攻击你从而让他空门大开。
prerequisites_zh: 敏捷13，闪避，近身投掷或贴身射击（Point-Blank Master, APG），武器专攻（所选远程武器）。
benefit_zh: 选择一种远程武器或投掷武器。当你使用这种武器进行一次远程攻击时，你可以选择触发一个或多个正威胁你的敌人的借机攻击。针对这些攻击，你获得+4闪避加值。如果敌人的这次借机攻击未能命中你，他对你失去敏捷加值，持续到你这次行动轮结束。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力来对你借机攻击失手的敌人进行一次攻击（在他失去他在对抗你的AC上的敏捷加值后）。
